meanings.definition: Return to a previous state or condition.
meanings.sent1: After trying the new recipe, she reverted to her old favorite dish.
meanings.sent2: The software update caused errors, so they reverted to the previous version.
meanings.sent3: When the clock struck midnight, Cinderella reverted to her rags.
meanings.sent4: The garden, once flourishing, reverted to a wild jungle after neglect.
meanings.sent5: The magician's spell reverted the frog back into a prince.

meanings.definition: Go back to an earlier state or situation.
meanings.sent1: He reverted to his childhood habits when visiting his parents' house.
meanings.sent2: The town reverted to its peaceful state after the festival ended.
meanings.sent3: The time machine malfunctioned, causing him to revert to the dinosaur era.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house reverted to a spooky appearance as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The aging potion reverted her back to a teenager for a day.
